summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 57th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 191720, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
